alert.note: Alert for Holmes; Humphreys; Sharkey; Yazoo (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 06 at 4:48PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Holmes, northern Yazoo, Humphreys and Sharkey Counties through 530 PM CDT... At 447 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles southwest of Ebenezer to 6 miles north of Yazoo City to near Holly Bluff. Movement was north at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Rolling Fork, Coxburg and Midnight around 505 PM CDT. Brozville around 510 PM CDT. Anguilla and Tolarville around 515 PM CDT. Lexington and Nitta Yuma around 520 PM CDT. Howard around 525 PM CDT. Belzoni, Tchula, Delta City and Panther Burn around 530 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by these storms include Eden, Silver City and Louise. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. High winds can bring down trees and large limbs resulting in serious injury or property damage. Exercise extreme caution when outdoors during such strong winds...and be especially aware of older trees.
